snippet: President Malam Bacai Sanhá, known to have diabetes, was being treated at a hospital in Paris.
abstract: Malam Bacai Sanha, president of Guinea-Bissau who was elected in tiny, coup-prone nation on Africa’s western coast in 2009, dies at age 64.
lead_paragraph: President Malam Bacai Sanhá, known to have diabetes, was being treated at a hospital in Paris.

headline.seo: Malam Bacai Sanhá, President of Guinea-Bissau, Dies at 64
headline.main: President Malam Bacai Sanhá of Guinea-Bissau Dies at 64
headline.print_headline: M. B. Sanhá, 64, The President Of Guinea-Bissau
